title: Spain For Dummies 4th Edition{BBS}
description:

Its good weather and many varied attractions make it ideal for year-round vacationing. Spain is the home of diverse cultures and traditions. From the stoic independence of the Basques to the progressive architecture and design of the Catalans and the sultry rhythms and sun-drenched siestas of the Andalusians, youÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢ll discover an intriguing, welcoming country. This guide gets you going with info on:

    * The three major areas: Northern Spain, including Barcelona, the Costa Brava, and the Basque Country; Central Spain, including Madrid and Castile, and Southern Spain, including Andalusia, Seville, Cordoba, and Granada

    * Meandering through AndalusiaÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s pueblos blancos amid the rolling hills and olive groves and near the famous sherry wineries and prancing horses in Jerez and the southern beaches of the Costa de la Lux and Costa del Sol
